mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO api_user_active_report ( id, date, user_count, increase_user_count, login_user_count, login_times, web_login_times, app_login_times, pay_user_count, pay_times, video_use_user_count, video_use_times, exercise_use_user_count, news_use_user_count, message_use_user_count, create_time) SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1)+1 FROM api_user_active_report )AS id, a.* , (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT r.user_id) FROM api_user_login_record r LEFT JOIN api_user u on r.user_id=u.id WHERE r.create_time > CURDATE() AND( u.is_real=0 OR is_real is NULL))AS login_user_count, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM api_user_login_record r LEFT JOIN api_user u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.create_time > CURDATE() AND( u.is_real=0 OR u.is_real is NULL))AS login_times, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM api_user_login_record r INNER JOIN cms_dictionary d ON r.login_type = d.id LEFT JOIN api_user u on u.id=r.user_id WHERE r.create_time > CURDATE() AND d.image_url = 1 AND( u.is_real=0 OR u.is_real is NULL))AS web_login_times, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM api_user_login_record r INNER JOIN cms_dictionary d ON r.login_type = d.id LEFT JOIN api_user u on u.id=r.user_id WHERE r.create_time > CURDATE() AND d.image_url = 2 AND( u.is_real=0 OR u.is_real is NULL))AS app_login_times, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT o.pay_user_id)FROM api_record_orders o LEFT JOIN api_user u on o.user_id=o.pay_user_id WHERE o.trade_status = 1 AND o.trade_time > CURDATE() AND o.trade_type <> 3 AND( u.is_real=0 OR is_real is NULL))AS pay_user_count, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM api_record_orders o LEFT JOIN api_user u on o.pay_user_id=u.id WHERE o.trade_status = 1 AND o.trade_time > CURDATE() AND o.trade_type <> 3 AND( u.is_real=0 OR is_real is NULL) )AS pay_times, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT d.user_id) FROM api_video_play_detail d INNER JOIN api_user u on d.user_id=u.id WHERE d.create_time > CURDATE() AND( u.is_real=0 OR is_real is NULL))AS video_use_user_count, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM api_video_play_detail d INNER JOIN api_user u on d.user_id=u.id WHERE d.create_time > CURDATE() AND( u.is_real=0 OR is_real is NULL))AS video_use_times, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT d.user_id) FROM api_exercise_detail d INNER JOIN api_user u on d.user_id=u.id WHERE d.commit_time IS NOT NULL AND d.commit_time > CURDATE() AND( u.is_real=0 OR is_real is NULL))AS exercise_use_user_count, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT g.user_id) FROM api_group_news g INNER JOIN api_user u on g.user_id=u.id WHERE g.create_time > CURDATE() AND( u.is_real=0 OR is_real is NULL))AS news_use_user_count, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT m.from_user_id) FROM api_message m INNER JOIN api_user u ON u.id=m.from_user_id WHERE create_time > CURDATE() AND( u.is_real=0 OR is_real is NULL))AS message_use_user_count, SYSDATE() AS create_time FROM( SELECT CURDATE()AS date, COUNT((is_real=0 OR is_real is NULL) OR NULL)AS user_count, COUNT((u.register_date>CURDATE()AND (is_real=0 OR is_real is NULL) )OR NULL)AS increase_user_count FROM api_user u )AS a
